Package org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory

Interface ItemStackGenerator

All Superinterfaces:
Function<RandomProvider.Source,ItemStack>
public interface ItemStackGenerator extends Function<RandomProvider.Source,ItemStack>
A simple generator that takes a RandomGenerator and generates an ItemStack.
